content:
Hello All,
Rob Hausam will be leading a pre-connectathon call for the Terminology Services Track of the New Orleans Connectathon. Please join uys on Thursday, January 18, 2018 from 3:00- 4:00 ET at this GO TO Meeting. Let me know if you have questions!
Terminology Services Track Orientation for HL7 FHIR Connectathon
Thu, Jan 18, 2018 3:00 PM - 4:00 PM EST

Please join my meeting from your computer, tablet or smartphone.
https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/110668317

You can also dial in using your phone.
United States: +1 (571) 317-3122

Access Code: 110-668-317

First GoToMeeting? Let's do a quick system check: https://link.gotomeeting.com/system-check
